questions.question: In Arabic language the word Sunnah means _____________.

choices.answer: habit, custom, or way of doing things
What the Prophet (pbuh) said, did, approved, and any attribute of him.

questions.question: An example of the Prophet's actions is ______________.

choices.answer: Approving the du'aa his companion added when getting up from ruku' in Salah
The hadiths that describe how the Prophet (pbuh) looked like

questions.question: We can read Hadith Qudsi in Salah because its words are chosen by Allah.
Only the Qur'an is a revelation from Allah. Sunnah is based on the Prophet's own thoughts and ideas.
Even though both Qur'an and Sunnah are revealed by Allah, the difference between them is ______________.

choices.answer: The Qur'an is Allah's actual words but Sunnah's words are the Prophet's
only Sunnah or hadeeth can be recited in Salah
Qur'an can be authentic or non-authentic but Sunnah is always authentic

questions.question: A Muslim can follow and practice Islam relying only on the Qur'an.
Muslims need the Sunnah because it explains things that are mentioned briefly in the Qur'an.
Obeying the Prophet is important in Islam because

choices.answer: Allah told us to obey him
Allah chose him to be our role model
Obeying him is a way to win Allah's love

questions.question: The Prophet (pbuh) predicted that a time will come when some Muslims will claim that Sunnah is not important.
